# Nested Blockquotes

## Simple Nested

> Outer quote
> > Inner quote

## Triple Nested

> Level 1
> > Level 2
> > > Level 3

## Mixed Content Nested

> Outer has **bold**
> > Inner has *italic*
> > > Deepest has `code`

## Back and Forth

> Start outer
> > Go inner
> Back to outer
> > Inner again

## Quote With List Inside

> Before list
> - Item 1
> - Item 2
> After list

## Nested With Code

> Outer quote
> > ```
> > code block
> > inside nested
> > ```

## Long Nested Quote

> This is the first level of quoting.
> > This is the second level which contains more detailed information.
> > > This is the third and deepest level with the most specific content.

## Quote After Quote

> First quote block.

> Second quote block.

> Third quote block.

## Attribution Style

> To be or not to be
> > -- Shakespeare

## Complex Nesting

> Main point here.
> > Supporting evidence.
> > > Specific example.
> > More support.
> Conclusion.
